GSP29vnyps12u:3: tadihānyathākhyātipakṣe viparyayasya saṃśayasya ca vyavacchedārtham “yathāvasthitavyavahārānuguṇaṃ jñānam” iti pramāṇalakṣaṇe yathāvasthitādiviśeṣaṇam /
GSP29vnyps12u:10: dvitīye tu pakṣe sāmānyato dharmisphuraṇe sati apratipannatadvirodhaviruddhaviśeṣādhyavasāya iti //
GSP29vnyps12u:12: tatra ekaviśeṣasphuraṇaṃ yathā--- pītaḥ śaṅkha ityādi /
GSP29vnyps12u:15: parasparaviruddhānekaviśeṣavatar idṛśasya viparyayasya saṃśayādbhedo mithovirodhābhimānaviraheṇa samuccitādhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:23: adharmaṃ dharmamiti yā manyate tamasā vṛtā /
GSP29vnyps12u:32: anyathājñānaṃ vastuno vastvantaratayā bhānam; yathā---śukteḥ rūpyatayā /
GSP29vnyps12u:33: viparītajñānaṃ tu yathāvat vastuni bhāsamāne yuktibhistasyānyathopapādanam; yathā---jñātṛtayā ahantvena ātmani bhāsamāne 'pi kuyuktibhirasyabhrāntitopapādanaṃ kudṛśām” iti /
GSP29vnyps12u:38: yathā---ūrdhvavastumātragrahaṇe sati tadvirodhitayānanusaṃdhīyamānayormithaḥsphuṭavirodhayoḥ sthāṇutvapuruṣatvayoḥ sphuraṇam---ayaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti /
GSP29vnyps12u:40: tata eva “ḍolāvegavadatra sphuraṇakramaḥ” ityeke, ekasmin yugapadanyonyapratikṣepasya dhīviruddhatvāt
GSP29vnyps12u:48: 'pi saṃśayaḥ saṃbhavati; yathā--- ātmā jñānaṃ vā jñātā veti, jñānaṃ dharmo dharmi vetyādi; tathāpyābhimānikaṃ parasparapratikṣepitvaṃ tatrāpyastyeva
GSP29vnyps12u:50: taduktaṃ tattvaratnākare--- “kaścaiṣa saṃśayaḥ katividhaśca? ekasmin dharmiṇi viruddhānekaviśeṣāvabhāsaḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:56: pratyakṣatadābhāsavipratipatteḥ saṃśayo yathā--- cakṣuṣā samukhaṃ pratibhāti darpaṇatalam, sparśanena tvanyathā; kimidaṃ samukhaṃ nirmukhaṃ
GSP29vnyps12u:64: evaṃ pāmarādivākyavipratipatterapi ---nadyāstīre phalāni santi, na santi vetyādi /
GSP29vnyps12u:65: pratyakṣānumānavipratipatteryathā---cakṣuṣā pītaśaṅkhabhrame śaṅkhatvācca sitatvānumāne, kimayaṃ śaṅkhaḥ pītaḥ sito veti /
GSP29vnyps12u:67: anumānāgamavipratipatteryathā --- kiṃ paramāṇūpādānaṃ jagat, uta brahmopādānamiti eṣā dik
GSP29vnyps12u:68: kecittu vipratipattiśabdamātre muhyanto vādivipratipattimeva vipratipattiṃ manyante, tadayuktam, viśeṣābhāvāt //
GSP29vnyps12u:71: iti ; tadapi nūnaṃ parānukāramātram, dvitīyatṛtīyayorakairāśyāt grāhakāvāntarabhedasyātiprasaṅgitvāt aprayojakatvācca /
GSP29vnyps12u:76: asādhāraṇadharmādapi kecit saṃśayamāhuḥ; yathā---gandhavattvāt pṛthivī nityā anityā vetyādi
GSP29vnyps12u:80: tadayuktam; na hi tatra gandhavattvādinā saṃśayotpattiḥ, api tu vyatirekanirūpaṇavilambāprāgeva gandhādiviśiṣṭadravyasya nityānityasādhāraṇatayā bhāsamānairdravyatvādibhireva /
GSP29vnyps12u:83: gandhavattvāt pṛthivī nityā vā anityā veti tu yadā kaścidvyavaharet,
GSP29vnyps12u:84: tatrāpi gandhavattvaṃ nityatvānityatvayoranyatarasya prayojakaṃ na vā ityeva saṃdehaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:86: atha nityavyāvṛttadharmavattvādanityatvam anityavyāvṛttadharmavattvācca nityatvaṃ puraskṛtya nityā anityā veti saṃśate; tadāpi hetubhūtadharmadvayanimitto 'yaṃ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:88: gandhastu tatra sāmānyarūpastaṭasthaḥ; na tu hetuḥ //
GSP29vnyps12u:90: yathā hi ūrdhvatvamubhayasādhāraṇam, tathā vādiparigṛhītatvāderapi sādhāraṇatvāt vimativiṣayasya dharmiṇo vā sāmānyaveṣasya tadubhayasādhāraṇyāditi /
GSP29vnyps12u:91: tathāpi sādhāraṇadharmasya sahānubhūtasthāṇutvapuruṣatvasmārakatvavat vipratipatterapisamānadharmonnītinirapekṣāyā eva tadupajīvyatayā tatpūrvabhāvinyāḥ sākṣāttadviśeṣasmārakatvasiddherdvaidhamuktamasmābhiḥ punaścāyaṃ dvitricaturādiśirodhikaraṇabhedādbahuvidhaḥ; yathā--- ayaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti, ghaṭaḥ satyo 'satyo nirvacanīyo 'nirvacanīyo
GSP29vnyps12u:93: tathā imau sthāṇū vā puruṣau vā, ete padārthāḥ satyā asatyā nirvacanīyā anirvacanīyā vetyādi
GSP29vnyps12u:94: yastu dvayoranyatarasya coratve siddhe ayaṃ coraḥ ayaṃ vā cora iti
GSP29vnyps12u:95: saṃdehaḥ, sa tu ayaṃ coro na vā ityevaṃrūpasaṃśayadvayasamāhāraḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:96: yadvā yaścoraḥ, saḥ ayam ayaṃ vā ityeka eva /
GSP29vnyps12u:99: tātparyānnirṇayagarbhatvam, tathāpi ubhayoranyataraviśeṣanirṇayābhāvāt tasminnaṃśe saṃśaya eva /
GSP29vnyps12u:100: na caikasyāpi jñānasya saṃśayanirṇayātmatāvirodhaḥ, sarvasminnapi saṃśaye dharmyaśādau nirṇayasya dustyajatvāt //
GSP29vnyps12u:102: pūrvo yathā--sthāṇvātmake vastuni sthāṇuḥ puruṣo veti /
GSP29vnyps12u:104: tatra nirūpakāṇāṃ prāyaśaḥ pūrva eva bhavati /
GSP29vnyps12u:106: yadvā nirīhasyaiva kadācit dvitīyena saṃśayena viparyayeṇa ca pravṛttasya daivāt tadātanārthasaṃnipātenābhimatalābha iti //
GSP29vnyps12u:107: punarapi imau saṃśayaviparyayau sāmānyadharmiṇo viśeṣāṇāṃ cānubhūyamānatvasmaryamāṇatvādibhedāt bahuvidhāvūhanīyāviti //
GSP29vnyps12u:108: kiṃsajñako 'yaṃ vṛkṣa ityevamādirūpo 'nadhyavasāyo nāmānyo jñānaviśeṣa iti
GSP29vnyps12u:111: ūhastu prāyaḥ puruṣeṇānena bhavitavyamityādirūpa ekakoṭisahacaritabhūyodharmadarśanādanutkaṭānyakoṭikaḥ sa eva /
GSP29vnyps12u:112: prāyaḥ puruṣeṇa bhavitavyamiti puruṣa evetyabhiprāyaścet yathocitaṃ pratyakṣānumānādiṣvanupraveśaḥ
GSP29vnyps12u:118: āha ca bhagavān śaunakaḥ--- “dṛṣṭānumānāgamajaṃ dhyānasyālambanaṃ tridhā /
GSP29vnyps12u:121: 'pi sarvābhyupagatapramāṇānāmayameva viṣaya iti na kenāpi pramāṇena
GSP29vnyps12u:123: sarvābhyupagatapramāṇānāmiti ca parābhyupagamamātraṃ dyotayati, tatra prativādinaḥ ṣaṭpramāṇābhyupagamāt
GSP29vnyps12u:124: pratyakṣānumānāgamānāmeva ca mitho bhedo vedārthasaṃgrahe viśadamupapāditaḥ //
GSP29vnyps12u:126: “jñānamindriyaliṅgāgamayogajo vastuniścayaḥ” iti, tatrāpi yogajasya pratyakṣasya prādhānyāt pṛthagvyapadeśaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:132: pratyakṣānumānāgamākhyaṃ pramāṇajātamāgamagamyaṃ ca nirastanikhiladoṣagandhamanavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaṃ sarvajñaṃ satyasaṃkalpaṃ paraṃ brahmābhyupagacchatāṃ kiṃ na setsyati kiṃ
GSP29vnyps12u:134: yadyapi smṛtirapi yathārthā pramāṇamiti vakṣyate, tathāpi pratyakṣādimūlatayā tadaviśeṣāt pṛthaganuktiḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:135: uktaṃ ca tattvaratnākare --- “pratyakṣādimūlānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ svasvamūle 'ntarbhāvavivakṣayā pramāṇatritvāvirodhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:139: prajñāparitrāṇe tu smṛtiprāmāṇyānabhyupagame 'pi jñānasya tāvat karaṇabhedāccāturvidhyamevoktam---
GSP29vnyps12u:145: ityādinā svayaṃsiddhidivyayoḥ pṛthaṅnirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam, tat pratyakṣāvāntaravairūpyabodhanābhiprāyam
GSP29vnyps12u:151: sākṣāttvaṃ ca jātirūpa upādhirūpo vā kaścit jñānasvabhāvaviśeṣaḥ svātmasākṣikaḥ //
GSP29vnyps12u:164: kimidaṃ vaiśadyaṃ nāma ? asādhāraṇākāreṇa vastvavabhāsakatvam--” ityādi //
GSP29vnyps12u:177: mīmāṃsakānāmapratyakṣatvādvā, asmatsukhādivadityādyanumānānāṃ vipakṣe bādhakavirahādibhirābhāsatvāt, āgamabādhaprasaṅgasyaiva puraskāre tvāgamenaiva caritārthatvāt; anyathā dharmādayaḥ kasyaciccakṣurgrāhyā iti vadato bauddhasya kiṃ prativakṣyasi /
GSP29vnyps12u:178: yaścānuvyavasāye saviṣayavyavasāyapratyakṣatāmicchati, tasyāsmadādiṣvapi dharmādivyavasāyānuvyavasāye dharmādipratyakṣatvasiddhau kathaṃ tadatiriktayogipratyakṣānumāsiddhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:189: ata eva hi gīyate--- “divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ---” ityādi /
GSP29vnyps12u:209: yathoktaṃ tattvaratnākare--- “atra vṛddhā vidāmāsuḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃnikarṣaṇam
GSP29vnyps12u:224: grahaṇāt, tāvataiva viśiṣṭagrahaṇasiddheḥ, samavāyavāde 'pi tasyaiva gṛhyamāṇasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvarūpatvāt,
GSP29vnyps12u:226: na ca samavāyasya savikalpakaikaviṣayateti vācyam, nirvikalpake dharmavaddharmivacca tatsaṃbandhasyāpyaindriyikatvāviśeṣeṇa
GSP29vnyps12u:227: grahaṇasaṃbhavāt, yogyasya saṃnikṛṣṭagṛhyamāṇasaṃbandhinaḥ saṃbandhasyāgrahaṇānupapatteḥ, anyathā nityaṃ tadagrahāpātāt /
GSP29vnyps12u:232: na ca savikalpakaṃ na pratyakṣamiti vācyam, sākṣātkārābādhādyaviśeṣāt //
GSP29vnyps12u:241: “nirvikalpakamekajātīyeṣu dravyeṣu prathamapiṇḍagrahaṇam” ityādibhāṣyaṃ tu udāharaṇaparaṃ yojyam /
GSP29vnyps12u:243: jñānaṃ savikalpakam, ekajātīyeṣu prathamapiṇḍagrahaṇam dvitīyādipiṇḍagrahaṇeṣu prathamākṣasaṃnipātajaṃ ca jñānaṃ nirvikalpakam”
GSP29vnyps12u:253: ata eva kudṛṣṭīnāṃ sanmātragrāhi pratyakṣamityavilakṣajalpitaṃ nirastam /
GSP29vnyps12u:255: bhrāntirūpo 'pi hi vikalpaḥ kṣaṇikatvānna viramya vyāpartumalam /
GSP29vnyps12u:257: na ca svayaṃ dharmipratiyogigrahaṇābhāve bhedagrahaṇaṃ manyase /
GSP29vnyps12u:258: tathāpi yadi kalpanā bhedaviśiṣṭaṃ yugapadgṛhṇāti, kā pratyakṣe sarpamṛtiḥ
GSP29vnyps12u:260: abheda iva bhedo 'pi svarūpataḥ pratītau na pratiyogisākāṅkṣaḥ;
GSP29vnyps12u:263: ata eva dharmadharmiṇordharmipratiyoginoranyeṣāṃ ca pratītāvanyonyāśrayo nirastaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:265: bhedaśabdena vyavahārasya tu pratisaṃbandhinirūpitākāre vyutpannatvāt tadapekṣā /
GSP29vnyps12u:266: bhedatvaṃ hi bhedānāṃ pratiyoginā nirūpyam na tu jātyādilakṣaṇaṃ svarūpam;
GSP29vnyps12u:267: yadgraho yatra yadāropavirodhī, sa hi tasya tasmādbhedaḥ; gotvādi ca gṛhyamāṇaṃ svasmin svāśraye cāśvatvādyāropaṃ nirūṇaddhīti svasya
GSP29vnyps12u:269: api ca pratiyogisāpekṣatvanirapekṣatvalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmādhyāsena bhedāt svarūpabhedagrahaṇaikyāṃ na saṃbhavatīti vadan bhedaduṣaṇārthameva bhedaṃ sādhayatīti svavacanavirodha iti //
GSP29vnyps12u:272: śabdajanyamapi pratyakṣamastīti ta eva varṇayanti; tadapyayuktam,
GSP29vnyps12u:274: na hi parokṣajananasvabhāvatayā siddhā sāmagrī viśeṣābhāve kvacit svabhāvamatipatet /
GSP29vnyps12u:275: na caikajātīyasāmagrītaḥ prasūtaṃ kāryaṃ vicitraṃ syāt, ekayaivava sāmagryā sarvajātīyotpattiprasaṅgāt ekasya kāryasya viruddhajātiyogaprasaṅgācca /
GSP29vnyps12u:277: 'daśamo 'ham' iti pratyayo hi nendriyasvātantryeṇodeti, kintu puruṣavacanānurodhena /
GSP29vnyps12u:278: tanmūle 'pi cet pratyakṣatā, evam 'dharmavāṃstvamasi' iti kārtāntikopadeśādau 'tādṛśo 'hamasmi' iti bodhe dharmāderapi
GSP29vnyps12u:280: tataścāpratyakṣamiti jagati kiñcinna syāt, pratyakṣabhūtaṃ yatkiñciduddiśya viśeṣaṇatayaiva sarvasya pratyakṣatvopapatteḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:281: pūrvāvagatadaśamabhāvaṃ tu puruṣaṃ pratyupadeśe bhāṣarāśipraviṣṭamaṣīnyāyena pūrvāparāparokṣaṇīnairantaryeṇa madhyavartiśabdajanyadhiyo 'parokṣatvavyavahāraḥ kasyacit syādvā na vā /
GSP29vnyps12u:283: 'parokṣārthagocaratvāt “daśamastvamasi” “saṃvit svaprakāśā” ityādivākyavat ityādyanumānāni nirastāni, daśamatvasvaprakāśatvādiviśiṣṭākāreṇa dṛṣṭānteṣvaparokṣajñānajananāsiddheḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:284: tathā vigītaḥ śabdo na svavācyagocarapratyakṣadhījanakaḥ, śabdatvāt,
GSP29vnyps12u:289: pratyakṣaṃ cidacinmayaṃ jagadidaṃ yasyetyanuśrūyate yaścānanyadhiyāmanantavibhavaḥ pratyakṣatāmaśnute
GSP29vnyps12u:290: yaścaiko yugapatsadā svata idaṃ viśvaṃ darīdṛśyate prājñaṃ taṃ pratipannamokṣaṇavidhādakṣaṃ didṛkṣemahi //
GSP29vnyps12u:291: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau pratyakṣādhyāye dvitīyamāhnikam //
